summary: Congress and the Office of Personnel Management authorized certain agencies to temporarily use alternative hiring procedures to expedite hiring for staff with skills needed to respond to the pandemic . OPM gave 5 agencies "direct hiring authority"—allowing them to temporarily eliminate competitive rating and ranking procedures and veterans' preference procedures for some positions. Lessons learned during the pandemic could improve the use of hiring authorities...
title: Federal Hiring: OPM Should Collect and Share COVID-19 Lessons Learned to Inform Hiring During Future Emergencies
